example:
() => (
  <Truncate>
    When you're using progressive disclosure, you might have text that
    you've decided is too long to display all at once. You don't want
    to overwhelm your users, so you want to keep it hidden but accessible. Use a
    Truncate component to make sure your text fits within its parent and
    doesn't take over your designs.
  </Truncate>
)

info.title: Default truncate
info.description: By default, truncate components will limit their children to 100% of the parent width.
